Lynks (YC W2016) | https://www.lynks.com | Alexandria & Cairo, Egypt | Full-time | ONSITE

Lynks is the best way to buy fashion and beauty products from the US. We believe that we can bring the World closer together by enabling cross-border commerce. By greasing the wheels of global e-commerce we are building the modern-day Silk Road. Weâ€™re looking for: Junior & Senior Full-stack Engineer: Someone with strong knowledge in Ruby in Rails Frontend Developer: Someone with extensive Javascript experience who worked with a multitude of JS frameworks iOS / Android Developer: A mobile engineer with a few published app under their belt To apply, please email me: meid [at] lynks.com
